applications.description: Use of tree-based models like Extreme Gradient Boosting (XGBoost) to predict Left Ventricular Reverse Remodeling (LVRR) in patients with first-diagnosed idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy before drug therapy
applications.real_world_implementation: Facilitates disease management and invasive therapy selection in cardiovascular medicine by distinguishing between patients who may or may not respond to standard medical treatment
applications.implementation_site: Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hospital, Sun Yat-sen University, Guangzhou, China
